# Markdown is great

### Text

* Text can be plain
  + *italic / emphasized*
  + **bold**
  + `verbatim`

### Numbered Lists

The numbers in numbered lists do not matter. Items are automatically numbered:

1. item 1
3. item 2
    + sub-item 1
1. item 3

### Links

This is a [link](www.git.com)

### Equations

#### Inline Equations

According to Einstein, $E=mc^{2}$

#### Equation Block

$$E=mc^{2}$$

### Images

![R logo](images/r.png) The R logo.
